interview: California Guitar Trio

The California Guitar Trio talks about their origins with Robert Fripp and the state of the music industry.

discover: iNFiNiEN

Philadelphia-based rock band iNFiNiEN is a wonderful group of people who love making music for all the right reasons.

share: California Guitar Trio Plays Daydreaming By Radiohead

The California Guitar Trio performs Radiohead's Daydreaming live in 4K.

learn: Taurus Bulba E Mixolydian Riffage

We run through one of our favorite and most artistic Steve Vai riffs.

discover: Nora Germain

Jazz violinist, prodigy/virtuoso, singer/songwriter, dancer, author, and ball of energy!

concert: Aspirations by Gentle Giant feat. Keneally, West, Green, Mortimore

Mike Keneally, Andy West, Gary Green, and Malcolm Mortimore play Gentle Giant's Aspirations live in Albuquerque, Oct. 2017.
